meanings.definition: A screen or partition in a church separating the sanctuary from the nave, often decorated with icons.
meanings.sent1: The iconostases in the church beautifully divide the sacred area from the rest of the space.
meanings.sent2: The priest stood behind the ornate iconostases during the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to peek through the iconostases during the service.
meanings.sent4: The iconostases stood tall like a silent guardian between the holy and the mundane.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the iconostases captured the attention of all who entered the church.

meanings.definition: The icons collectively displayed on an iconostasis.
meanings.sent1: The colorful iconostases depicted various saints and biblical scenes.
meanings.sent2: Visitors admired the ancient icons on the iconostases in awe.
meanings.sent3: The iconostases seemed to whisper stories of faith to those who gazed upon them.
meanings.sent4: The iconostases, like a gallery of spiritual art, adorned the church walls.
meanings.sent5: The flickering candlelight danced upon the serene faces of the icons on the iconostases.
